scripts.postinstall: (cd Backend/ApiService && npm i); (cd Backend/IGDBService && npm i); (cd Backend/MailService && npm i); (cd Frontend && npm i && npm run build)
scripts.deploy: (cd Backend/IGDBService && node "index.js" &); (cd Backend/MailService && node "index.js" &); (cd Backend/ApiService && node "index.js")
